name: Gravity Arrows
description:
Gravity Arrows is a puzzle platformer made for GBJAM 7.  Move, jump, and change gravity to reach the exit in each level.  There are 20 levels with some new mechanics being introduced in the later ones.

Controls:

A: Z (jump and menu selection)

B: Unused

Up/down/left/right: arrow keys (move and menu navigation)

Start: R (restart and menu selection)

Select: Space (go back to previous menu)
